jobDescription: Data Analyst  Ref No.: 18-28266  Location: Milpitas, California Description : Has 4+ years of experience working with quantitative methods, ideally integrated with qualitative methods  Has designed and executed multiple quantitative research studies across industries  Advanced statistical analysis (clustering, regression, conjoint)  Web analytics and analysis  Survey design and analysis  Experience in a programming language commonly used for data manipulation and computational statistics (such as Python, R, Matlab, C++, Java or Go), and with SQL.  We are looking for someone closer to a data analyst / data scientist, but with solid understanding of UX design and qualitative research. Also they will need to show us some evidence of their work and reflect well on their role in a design team.  Have a strong understanding of research methods, and the confidence to invent your own as needed  Care deeply about customers and build empathy for their needs with your stakeholders  Design and conduct research activities from start to finish, from large scale studies to guerilla style sessions  Map the issues discovered through your research back to the product and service ecosystem you are supporting  Translate feedback and customer needs into insights that inspire and inform product development.
